meanings.definition: A type of throwing stick used by Australian Aboriginal peoples.
meanings.sent1: The Aboriginal man aimed the wommeras at the kangaroo.
meanings.sent2: The wommeras were essential tools for hunting in the outback.
meanings.sent3: The wommeras were so well-crafted, they almost seemed magical.
meanings.sent4: His accuracy with the wommeras was like a sharpshooter with a rifle.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the wommeras cutting through the air echoed in the valley.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient wommeras from different tribes.
meanings.sent2: The collection included various wommeras made of different materials.
meanings.sent3: The wommeras lined up in rows looked like a small forest of sticks.
meanings.sent4: The abundance of wommeras in the exhibit was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The variety of wommeras showcased the diversity of Aboriginal cultures.
